entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Mildred Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM MDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 11.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Widespread smoke. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this morning. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 05 May 2016
